name: @spectree/spline
description: Automated interactive 3D scene creation and web-ready export pipeline using Spline (spline.design). Converts structured prompts into production-grade interactive 3D experiences with materials, state-based animations, and multi-format export (React, iframe, MP4, GLB) for web and mobile apps

agents.name: sp-orchestrator
agents.description: Entry-point agent that chains all sub-agents and manages the quality refinement loop (max 3 rounds) from prompt to exported interactive 3D scene

agents.name: sp-prompt-interpreter
agents.description: Parses structured or natural-language prompts into a normalized scene specification with objects, materials, lighting, interactions, and export targets

agents.name: sp-scene-planner
agents.description: Creates a complete scene graph from the scene spec with object hierarchies, transforms, material assignments, state definitions, and event bindings

agents.name: sp-object-builder
agents.description: Creates and configures 3D objects in Spline including parametric shapes, text, vector paths, imported models, and groups

agents.name: sp-material-stylist
agents.description: Applies materials (glass, PBR, gradient, matcap), textures, environment maps, and post-processing effects (bloom, DOF, noise)

agents.name: sp-interaction-designer
agents.description: Defines states, events (hover, click, scroll), actions, timeline animations, and transitions for interactive Spline scenes

agents.name: sp-quality-inspector
agents.description: Reviews scene quality against standards for composition, materials, interactions, and web performance with scored pass/fail

agents.name: sp-export-manager
agents.description: Exports scenes in production formats: web embeds (React, iframe, vanilla JS), video (MP4), images (PNG), and geometry (GLB/OBJ)

skills.name: spline-pipeline-process
skills.description: 3-phase pipeline process from structured prompt to exported interactive 3D scene with iterative quality refinement

instructions.name: spline-config
instructions.description: Project configuration including resolution, export formats, video settings, quality thresholds, and target file sizes

dependencies.spline-*: Requires Spline MCP tools for scene creation, material application, and export
